channel.title: Show equiptment Interface. Help rep++ for answer!
channel.description:
Okay so when I click the show item equipped it comes up, show all correct bonus' (attk, mage, range, def, etc.)
[b]But[/b] the little character that shows, it's just the default character but [u]doesn't show him with the items that the player is equipping. [/u]
[b]How can I make it show the armour shows up? [/b] I will rep++ for help. Thanks!

item.title: Show equiptment Interface. Help rep++ for answer!
item.dc:creator: @JGX JGX
item.description:
@JGX wrote:

Yeah I am. It’s in the development team section. My Management Team and I are working on it. It’s about 90% done. It won’t be up until January 1st 2012. But it will be up and i’m sure you’ll be hearing some of your friends joining lol.

Read full topic
item.source: Show equiptment Interface. Help rep++ for answer!
